GSD.description:
selinux: Add boundary check in put_entry()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 477722f31ad73aa779154d1d7e00825538389f76. For more details please see the references link.
